# items

**Instance Property**

An array of metadata items in the timed metadata group.

## Declaration

```swift
var items: [AVMetadataItem] { get set }
```

## Discussion

The array contains instances of [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVMetadataItem].

## Configuring the group

- **timeRange**: The time range of the timed metadata.

items.description: The time range of the timed metadata.
items.name: timeRange
